data.title: Geoffrey Lewis Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Geoffrey Lewis on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Geoffrey Lewis including The Lawnmower Man, Maverick, and more.
data.text:
The Boogeyman

The BAU travels to Ozona, a small Texas community, to investigate the murders of children.

Empty Nests

In this pilot for another series (Empty Nest, obviously the concept was retooled), the girls' friend Renee is feeling depressed and lonely with her children grown up and moved out and her husband's workaholic habits.

One Day, One Room

House is on a mission to get his handicapped parking spot back while he and the team take on the case of a teenage gypsy whose family refuses all modern medical treatments.

Who Threw the Barbitals in Mrs. Fletcher's Chowder?

Shortly after Sheriff Tupper's sister (Anne Meara) leaves her husband and seeks refuge in Cabot Cove, a murder occurs. With Tom Bosley.
